markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You initiate an intimidating walk, thumping the cudgel menacingly against your palm. As part of activating this item, you can Stride twice. For the next minute, whenever you successfully Strike a creature with the _nightmare cudgel_, you can use a free action to attempt an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the struck creature.
name: Interact (emotion, mental)
